episodes.title: Skeptic Presents: The Con Academy, Vol. 1
episodes.author: mrdeity.com
episodes.summary:
This is the first in a new series of videos I'm doing with and for The Skeptic Society.
http://skeptic.com
http://mrdeity.com/donate.html 
Written and Produced by Brian Keith Dalton, Pat Linse, Michael Shermer
Featuring: Michael Shermer, Brian Keith Dalton, John Rael, Jen Brown, Matt David, Eduard Pastor, Emery Emery, and Wendy Hughes.
Production assistance: Eduard Pastor, Matt David, and John Rael.
Shot, Edited, and Directed by Brian Keith Dalton.
Special thanks to Russell Friedman and everyone at the Grief Recovery Institute in Sherman Oaks, CA.
Music by Videoblocks.com and Final Cut Production music.
Shot on Panasonic AF100, Gh2, and Gh3 cameras.
The Con Academy is not, in any way, affiliated with The Khan Academy.
